Article Title: 'Has no basis': BJP MP responds to Congress leader Rashid Alvi's statement over India-Pakistan cricket match
Article Text: NEW DELHI: BJP MP Praveen Khandelwal on Sunday responded to Congress leader Rashid Alvi 's statement on the Champions Trophy India vs Pakistan match today. He said that politics and sports policy is different and the Indian cricket team is definitely going to win the match."Rashid Alvi probably forgets that diplomacy is different, politics is different and sports policy is different.In sports, the Indian team is the best. The match is being played in Dubai. What Rashid Alvi is saying has no basis. The Indian team is definitely going to win the match against Pakistan," said Khandelwal.Earlier today, Alvi criticised the decision and questioned why the BJP government had authorised a match with Pakistan."Why did the Indian government give permission for the match? You are playing with those who spread terrorism...Is this right? Every BJP leader makes a lot of statements against Pakistan. They say if Congress wins, a celebration will be held there (Pakistan). Now, the Indian team is playing cricket with the Pakistan team, What kind of policy is this? If Pakistan is our enemy, then what's the point of playing with them," he said."Indian government has repeatedly said that we will not talk until the terrorism is over. Has it ended? Haven't our soldiers being killed in Kashmir? What will the mother and sisters of that martyred soldier think? I condemn this and this policy of government is beyond understanding," he added.The Congress leader said that by authorising the cricket match, the government was showing disrespect to the families of soldiers who sacrificed their lives fighting terrorism."The question is why our government has given permission for this match. You are playing with those people who spread terrorism. Will the family member of our martyred soldier tolerate this? They are disrespecting them," Alvi said.
Article Summary: Bjp mp praveen khandelwal responds to congress leader rashid alvi's statement on the champions trophy india vs pakistan match today. He said that politics and sports policy is different and the indian cricket team is definitely going to win the match. Earlier today, alvi questioned why the bjp government had authorised a match with pakistan.

Article Title: ‘Virat victory’: Political leaders hail Team India’s triumph over Pakistan in Champions Trophy 2025
Article Text:
Kohli and Shreyas

NEW DELHI: Political leaders across party lines congratulated Team India on Sunday after its six-wicket victory over Pakistan in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025.Union home minister Amit Shah called it an “electrifying performance,” while BJP President J.P. Nadda lauded Virat Kohli ’s century, saying the match was a “perfect example of teamwork.”Union sports minister Mansukh Mandaviya hailed Kohli for becoming the fastest to reach 14,000 ODI runs. “A great all-round performance by the team,” he wrote on X.Chief ministers, including Yogi Adityanath, MK Stalin, Mamata Banerjee, and N Chandrababu Naidu, joined in, celebrating the win as a moment of national pride. Odisha CM Naveen Patnaik and Assam CM Himanta Biswa Sarma also praised Kohli’s leadership.Congress leaders Rahul Gandhi and Mallikarjun Kharge highlighted the team’s resilience, with Kharge specifically commending Kohli and Kuldeep Yadav for their contributions.Delhi CM Rekha Gupta and Maharashtra Deputy CM Eknath Shinde credited the win to India’s strong teamwork, while Rajasthan Home Minister Gajendra Singh Khimsar called it a “Virat victory.”The match saw India successfully chase 242, with Kohli’s century leading the charge. The team now looks ahead to its upcoming matches in the tournament.
Article Summary: Political leaders across party lines congratulate team india on icc champions trophy 2025 win over pakistan. Chief ministers, including yogi adityanath, mk stalin, mamata banerjee, and n chandrababu naidu celebrated the win as a moment of national pride.

Article Title: Four Los Angeles Lakers Starters Score 20+ Points to Defeat Denver Nuggets: Ended Nine-Game Win Streak
Article Text:
Credits: NBA

Denver Nuggets' Streak Snapped: Four Los Angeles Lakers Players Score 20+ Points in 123-100 Romp



Remember when the Denver Nuggets looked invincible? Like a superhero on a nine-game winning streak, they were soaring higher than a Taylor Swift concert ticket price. But just like every superhero movie needs a good villain, the Los Angeles Lakers swooped into Denver and played the role of kryptonite. Think Thanos snapping his fingers, but instead of half the universe disappearing, it was the Nuggets' winning streak vanishing into thin air. The final score? A resounding 123-100 victory for the purple and gold. But this wasn't just a win, it was a statement. A declaration that the Lakers are not to be trifled with.Leading the charge were four Lakers, each scoring 20+ points, like a basketball version of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse descending upon the Nuggets' defense. Luka Doncic , channeling his inner Zeus, rained down 32 points. LeBron James , ever the king, added a regal 25. Rui Hachimura , in a dramatic turn of events, contributed 21 points, a feat made even more impressive considering a mid-game injury scare that had Laker Nation holding its breath. And let's not forget Austin Reaves , who also chipped in with 21 points, proving that even the underdogs can bite.But just like a phoenix rising from the ashes (or, you know, a basketball player returning from the locker room), Hachimura returned. Hachimura's return wasn't just symbolic, it was impactful. He finished the game with 21 points, four assists, and a steal, shooting 58.3 percent from the field. He was raining three-pointers like confetti at a New Year's Eve party.Furthermore, LeBron James added 25 points, nine rebounds, five assists, and three blocks, while the Lakers limited their turnovers to just eight, while the Nuggets committed 20. After the game, James shared a head-turning analogy about the growing chemistry between him and Doncic as they continue to grow as teammates together. (via NBA "I'm a natural-born wide receiver, and he's a natural-born quarterback, so it fits perfectly," James said.ALSO READ: Why Is Elgin Baylor Being Celebrated Now? Los Angeles Lakers Icon’s Latest Honor Revealed Safe to say, this Lakers victory wasn't just about individual brilliance; it was a team effort. So, is this the start of a new era for the Lakers? Only time will tell. But one thing's for sure: they just sent a message to the rest of the league. And that message is loud and clear: The Los Angeles Lakers are back
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers defeated the denver nuggets 123-100. Luka doncic, lebron james, rui hachimura, and austin reaves each scored 20+ points. The win was a statement that the lakers are not to be trifled with.

Article Title: Auston Matthews gave a stern response when asked if Connor McDavid's winning goal at the 4 Nations Face-Off final haunted him
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Auston Matthews on Connor McDavid’s winning goal at the 4 Nations Face-Off finals

Connor McDavid and Auston Matthews have been credited with promoting the return of best-on-best hockey. As the No. 1 picks in the 2015 and 2016 NHL drafts, they were teased with a version of this during the 2016 World Cup of Hockey. However, they had never played for their respective countries at true best-on-best. Auston Matthews responded to McDavid's game-winning goal in the 4 Nations final with some blunt words.Auston Matthews excelled in the 4 Nations Face-Off final, scoring three points and two assists. He played over 20 minutes per game and missed a deflection on McDavid's goal, which led to a 3-2 loss to Canada.On Saturday, a reporter asked Auston Matthews if McDavid's goal haunted him to which Matthews simply replied, "Sure, Kevin." with a smile. Canada won their fourth consecutive international tournament with Connor McDavid's goal, while Matthews couldn't break up the play for the final goal."It's a great game. It's a great sport. And I hope we put on a good show these last couple days and gained some fans. Ultimately, you can't ask for a better show than that," McDavid said after Canada's win.Nathan MacKinnon scored the first goal in the game, followed by Brady Tkachuk and Jake Sanderson. Sam Bennett tied the game 2-2. In overtime, McDavid scored the game-winner, and Jordan Binnington made 31 saves for Canada. USA defenseman Zach Werenski believes the team is close to Canada and believes they will win soon."It just makes us hungrier," Werenski said, via NHL.com. "We know now that we're neck and neck with Canada. We expect to be in those games with them and expect to win. I think that's exciting for this group. It gives us a lot of confidence that our time is coming, our time is now. It's exciting.”Also post: Florida Panthers forward Matthew Tkachuk is out of Saturday's game against Seattle Kraken due to a lower-body injury Auston Matthews expressed pride in his team despite the loss to Team Canada in the 4 Nations Face-Off final. Auston Matthews, who assisted on goals by Brady Tkachuk and Jake Sanderson, will now focus on the season ahead as Maple Leafs captain.
Article Summary: Auston matthews responded to connor mcdavid's game-winning goal at the 4 nations face-off finals. He played over 20 minutes per game and missed a deflection on mcdavid’s goal, which led to a 3-2 loss to canada. Usa defenseman zach werenski believes the team is close to canada and will win soon.

Article Title: IND vs PAK: India set record for most consecutive tosses lost in ODIs
Article Text:
Pakistan's captain Mohammad Rizwan tosses the coin as India's captain Rohit Sharma looks on before the start of ICC Champions Trophy match. (AP)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Champions Trophy 2025: India, Pakistan apply final touches before blockbuster

Teams:

When the toss came in Pakistan skipper Mohammed Rizwan's favour in the Champions Trophy on Sunday, it set a world record for India. It marked the 12th consecutive toss lost for India in ODI contests as Pakistan chose to bat in the high-octane clash.India have now lost 12 consecutive tosses, a streak that began in November 23.Before this, Netherlands had the record for the most consecutive tosses lost in 50-over matches. They had gone without the coin coming in their favour for 11 matches in a spell that ran from March 2011 until August 2013.In the Group A match at the Dubai International Stadium , Pakistan decided to bat and made one change to their lineup from the opening fixture. In the opener, Pakistan were beaten convincingly by New Zealand.India, meanwhile, are on the cusp of qualifying for the semi-finals, should they win."We'll bat first, looks like a good surface. Want to put up a good target. Every match is important in ICC events, we will keep things normal. The boys are familiar with these conditions, we have done well here and we want to do our best today. We lost our last game, but it is past for us now. One change - Fakhar is out, Imam is in," Rizwan said after winning the toss.Men in Blue skipper Rohit confirmed an unchanged XI."Doesn't really matter, they won the toss so we'll bowl first. Looks similar to the last game, the surface is on the slower side. We have an experienced unit in batting, so we know what we need to do if the pitches get slower. Need an overall performance from the team - with bat and ball. The last game wasn't an easy one for us, which is always nice. You want to be under pressure and test yourself. We are playing the same team," Rohit said.The last time India and Pakistan clashed in the Champions Trophy was during the 2017 edition's final, when Virat Kohli-led unit was humbled by the Men in Green. India were skittled out for 158 runs while chasing a mammoth 338 runs.India (Playing XI): Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, Axar Patel, KL Rahul (wk), Hardik Pandya, Ravindra Jadeja, Harshit Rana, Mohammed Shami, Kuldeep YadavPakistan (Playing XI): Imam-ul-Haq, Babar Azam, Saud Shakeel, Mohammad Rizwan (wk/c), Salman Agha, Tayyab Tahir, Khushdil Shah, Shaheen Afridi, Naseem Shah, Haris Rauf, Abrar Ahmed. (ANI)
Article Summary: India have now lost 12 consecutive tosses, a streak that began in november 23. Pakistan captain mohammed rizwan won the toss and chose to bat. India are on the cusp of qualifying for the semi-finals, should they win.

Article Title: Hardik Pandya vs Babar Azam: Social media sparks meme fest after Pandya’s send-off to Pakistan batter
Article Text:
Hardik Pandya and Babar Azam (AP Photos)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

EXCLUSIVE | Rohit Sharma way better than Virat Kohli and Babar Azam: Former Pakistan pacer

NEW DELHI: The intense rivalry between India and Pakistan reached new heights on Sunday during the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 as Hardik Pandya dismissed Pakistan’s star batter Babar Azam in a dramatic fashion that took social media by storm.Pakistan had made a steady start, with Babar and Imam-ul-Haq looking to build a partnership after their skipper Mohammad Rizwan opted to bat first.However, Pandya’s fiery delivery to Babar turned the tide.Babar, who had been in good touch with five boundaries in his 23 runs off 26 balls, pushed at a slightly back-of-length ball from Pandya, hoping to play a cover drive.But the ball found the outside edge, and KL Rahul made a sharp catch to send Babar back to the pavilion.As the Indian players celebrated the key breakthrough, Pandya added his personal touch with a bold "bye-bye" wave directed at Babar, a gesture that instantly caught the attention of cricket fans worldwide.Social media quickly went into overdrive, with memes and reactions flooding platforms.Some fans viewed Pandya’s gesture as a sign of intense passion and competitive spirit, while others debated whether it crossed the line of sportsmanship.The dismissal came at a crucial moment in Pakistan's innings, with Babar's wicket falling at 41 in the ninth over.Pandya’s aggressive style, both with the ball and his send-off, added fuel to the already charged atmosphere of this high-profile encounter.Regardless of opinions, this incident will go down as one of the memorable momentsAs far as the match is concerned, India have entered as the favourites to win the encounter after their dominant win over Bangladesh in the previous match.
Article Summary: Hardik pandya dismissed pakistan's star batter babar azam in dramatic fashion. The dismissal came at a crucial moment in pakistan's innings. Pandya added his personal touch with a bold "bye-bye" wave directed at babar, a gesture that instantly caught the attention of cricket fans worldwide.

Article Title: Hardik Pandya joins 200-wicket club in international cricket
Article Text:
Hardik Pandya. (Pic Credit - X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

!

EXCLUSIVE | Rohit Sharma way better than Virat Kohli and Babar Azam: Former Pakistan pacer

NEW DELHI: Indian all-rounder Hardik Pandya on Sunday reached a significant milestone, claiming his 200th international wicket across formats. He achieved this feat during India's crucial ICC Champions Trophy clash against Pakistan in Dubai.Known for his explosive batting and effective seam bowling, Hardik has been a vital asset for India across all formats. He was at his best during the match, delivering an impressive spell of 2/31 in eight overs at an economy rate of 3.87.He dismissed Pakistan’s star batter Babar Azam, who was in attacking form, and later removed a well-set Saud Shakeel , who had reached a half-century.In 216 international matches, Hardik has taken 200 wickets at an average of 30.76, with his best figures being 5/28 — his only five-wicket haul in international cricket. He currently ranks as the 24th-highest wicket-taker in Indian cricket history.In 11 Tests, he has taken 17 wickets at an average of 31.05, with a best of 5/28. His ODI record includes 89 wickets in 91 matches at an average of 35.26, with best figures of 4/24.In T20Is, Hardik has claimed 94 wickets in 114 games at an average of 26.43, with a best of 4/16.Hardik continues to shine against Pakistan in ODIs, now boasting 10 wickets at an average of 24.60, with his best figures of 2/31 coming in this high-stakes encounter.On the match front, Saud Shakeel and skipper Mohammad Rizwan played gritty knocks to help Pakistan reach 241 all out against arch-rivals India.Pakistan, the defending champions, opted to bat first in this must-win encounter after losing to New Zealand in their tournament opener. A defeat against India, who started with a win over Bangladesh, would severely dent their semi-final hopes.After an early wobble, left-hander Shakeel (62) and Rizwan (46) steadied the innings with a slow but solid 104-run partnership for the third wicket. However, their dismissals triggered another collapse before a late cameo from Khushdil Shah (38) provided a much-needed boost on a sluggish pitch.Pakistan's innings wrapped up in 49.4 overs, with India's left-arm wrist spinner Kuldeep Yadav shining with figures of 3/40.
Article Summary: Hardik pandya claimed his 200th international wicket during india's champions trophy clash against pakistan in dubai. The all-rounder was at his best during the match, delivering an impressive spell of 2/31 in eight overs at an economy rate of 3.87. He dismissed pakistan’s star batter babar azam, who was in attacking form, and later removed a well-set saud shakeel.

Article Title: IND vs PAK: Virat Kohli becomes India's leading catch-taker in ODIs
Article Text: Virat Kohli set a new record for the most catches by an Indian player in ODI cricket with 158 catches in 299 matches. He achieved this milestone against Pakistan in the Champions Trophy, surpassing Mohammad Azharuddin's record of 156 catches in 334 matches.
Article Summary: Virat kohli set a new record for the most catches by an indian player in odi cricket with 158 catches in 299 matches. He achieved this milestone against pakistan in the champions trophy. Mohammad azharuddin's record of 156 catches in 334 matches was also broken.

Article Title: Jasprit Bumrah, Suryakumar Yadav and celebrities attend India vs Pakistan in Dubai - in photos
Article Text:
Jasprit Bumrah and Virat Kohli (Photo: X)

EXCLUSIVE | Rohit Sharma way better than Virat Kohli and Babar Azam: Former Pakistan pacer

NEW DELHI: India vs Pakistan is a festival that everyone wants to attend and witness live with their own eyes. Sunday’s encounter was no exception, as celebrities from all fraternities gathered under the roof of the Dubai International Cricket Stadium to witness what they call "the mother of all clashes".Cricketing stars such as Jasprit Bumrah , Tilak Varma, Abhishek Sharma, Suryakumar Yadav , Shahid Afridi and Imad Wasim were in attendance, accompanied by other celebrities such as Sonam Kapoor, Anand Ahuja, Sukumar, Chiranjeevi, Jasmin Walia, and Atif Aslam.Pakistan posted 241 all out in 50 overs against India in their ICC Champions Trophy 2025 Group A clash in Dubai. Opting to bat first, Pakistan struggled early as Babar Azam (23) edged Hardik Pandya to KL Rahul, and Imam-ul-Haq (10) was run out, leaving them at 47/2.Saud Shakeel (62 off 76) and skipper Mohammad Rizwan (46 off 77) rescued the innings with a crucial 104-run stand. However, India hit back after Axar Patel dismissed Rizwan in the 35th over.Shakeel soon followed, falling to Pandya, while Tayyab Tahir (4) and Salman Agha (19) failed to contribute significantly.At 200/7 in the 43rd over, Pakistan looked in trouble, but Khushdil Shah’s late surge (38 off 39) helped push the total to 241.India’s bowlers kept the pressure on, with Kuldeep Yadav (3/40) leading the attack, while Pandya (2/31), Axar Patel, Ravindra Jadeja, and Harshit Rana picked up key wickets.
Article Summary: Pakistan posted 241 all out in 50 overs against india in their icc champions trophy 2025 group a clash in dubai. Jasprit bumrah, tilak varma, abhishek sharma, suryakumar yadav, shahid afridi and imad wasim were in attendance.

NEW DELHI: Arch-rivals India and Pakistan are set to face each other in a crucial ICC Champions Trophy encounter at Dubai International Stadium on Sunday.India, under Rohit Sharma, began their Champions Trophy campaign strongly with a six-wicket victory over Bangladesh on Wednesday.Defending champions Pakistan, the tournament hosts, however experienced a setback in their opening match, losing to New Zealand by 60 runs in Karachi.Pakistan now face a must win situation to maintain their semis hopes alive while a victory for India would nearly guarantee their progression to the last four in the eight-team tournament.India's last Champions Trophy meeting with Pakistan however ended in disappointment, as they lost the 2017 final at The Oval, missing the opportunity to claim their second tournament title.India currently hold a psychological advantage, remaining undefeated against Pakistan in their last six ODI encounters since 2018, including a rain-affected group stage match in the 2023 Asia Cup.The teams' most recent encounter was during the 2024 T20 World Cup group stage in New York. India emerged victorious with a nine-run win, with Jasprit Bumrah earning Player of the Match honors for his bowling figures of 3 for 14.The India vs Pakistan Champions Trophy Group A match will take place on Sunday, February 23.The India vs Pakistan match will be held at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium in Dubai.The India vs Pakistan game will begin at 2:30 PM IST.The toss for India vs Pakistan ODI will take place at 2:00 PM IST.The coverage of India vs Pakistan ODI will begin from 1:30 PM IST.The India vs Pakistan game will begin at 1 PM in Dubai.Follow all the action from the India vs Pakistan Champions Trophy ODI on TimesofIndia.com Viewers in the USA can watch the upcoming India vs Pakistan Champions Trophy Group A match on Fubo TV.Canadian cricket fans can also access the crucial Group A encounter between India and Pakistan through Fubo TV's service.
Article Summary: India vs pakistan champions trophy group a match will take place on sunday, february 23. The india vs pakistan match will be held at the dubai international cricket stadium in dubai. The toss for india vspakistan odi will takeplace at 2:00 pm ist.

Article Title: Cooper Flagg's Performance Leads Duke Blue Devil to Major Win Over Illinois Fighting Illini
Article Text:
Credits: Getty Images

Cooper Flagg's Performance Highlights Duke's Historic Win Over Illinois

A new era of Blue Devil dominance is upon us, and it's led by a player drawing comparisons to everyone from Jayson Tatum to a young LeBron. This past Saturday, at the Mecca of basketball, Madison Square Garden , Duke didn't just win, they put on a show that would make even the Globetrotters blush, dismantling the Illinois Fighting Illini 110-67 in a performance for the ages. Think of it as a basketball equivalent of a Kanye concert crashing a Lollapalooza headline setThe buzz surrounding Cooper Flagg, the projected No. 1 pick in the 2025 NBA Draft, was deafening heading into the Sentinel One Classic. And while Flagg delivered, showcasing his dazzling array of skills with 16 points, seven rebounds, and five assists, including a couple of dunks that nearly took the roof off the Garden, this Duke victory was far from a one-man show.Under the tutelage of Jon Scheyer , who is proving to be a worthy successor to Coach K, the Blue Devils unleashed a balanced attack that left Illinois reeling. Sion James , not known for his long-range prowess, channeled his inner Steph Curry , nailing two early three-pointers. Tyrese Proctor and Isaiah Evans sliced and diced through the Illini defense, combining for 20 points. Even future draft picks Kon Knueppel and Khaman Maluach contributed.Duke's defense was a suffocating force, holding Illinois to a dismal 2-for-26 from beyond the arc. This was a team that averaged nearly ten three-pointers a game, completely neutralized by Duke’s relentless pressure. Questions about Duke's strength of schedule in the ACC and earlier losses to Kentucky and Kansas were emphatically answered. This team has evolved. They've gelled. They've found their identity. They’re not just a collection of talented individuals, they're a team, playing with a purpose.ALSO READ: Four Los Angeles Lakers Starters Score 20+ Points to Defeat Denver Nuggets: Ended Nine-Game Win Streak If Saturday night was any indication, that purpose is to cut down the nets in San Antonio. The message is clear: the Duke Blue Devils are back, and they’re coming for the crown.
Article Summary: Duke beat illinois 110-67 at madison square garden. Cooper flagg scored 16 points, seven rebounds, and five assists. Sion james channeled his inner steph curry with two early three-pointers. Tyrese proctor and isaiah evans sliced and diced through illini defense.

Article Title: Tyreek Hill's marriage to Keeta Vaccaro sparks sympathy for her among fans amid his children with different women
Article Text:
Image via Kirby Lee-Imagn Images

Tyreek Hill’s Wife Keeta Vaccaro Has A Fan Following That Now Sympathises With Her And Her Marriage



W.A.G.s to Riches | Official Trailer | Netflix

Tyreek Hill’s Mother In Law Has Been Slammed By Fans Due To Her Comments On The Star Player’s Children With Multiple Women



Tyreek Hill , the quarterback of the Miami Dolphins , has been in the news for a lot of controversial reasons related to his personal life. He recently appeared on the Netflix series, “WAGs to Riches” which follows the lives of wives of famous athletes and musicians. Tyreek Hill’s wife, Keeta Vaccaro is a part of that show and now, fans feel sympathy for her.The Netflix show, WAGs to Riches , consists of eight episodes and was shot when Keeta Vaccaro was still pregnant with their daughter. Some scenes with Keeta Vaccaro have raised eyebrows; this includes a scene where Keeta Vaccaro reveals that she is pregnant with her and Tyreek’s first child while the star player has ten children with multiple women.In another scene, Tyreek Hill’s wife, Keeta Vaccaro revealed that their marriage started with “storms” due to media scrutiny over Tyreek’s children with other women. Now fans feel nothing except sympathy for Tyreek Hill’s wife, Keeta Vaccaro.A fan took to X and wrote, “Just finished Wags to Riches.. Alexis and Keeta are my faves, they’re really sweet; Sharelle and Ashley are so unlikable on this show, which is disappointing because Sharelle really is a great business woman #WAGsToRiches”Another fan wrote, “Keeta is so pretty and she seems like such a nice girl. I want better for her #WAGsToRiches”, while a third fan wrote, “I actually really really like keeta you can tell she good folk #WAGsToRiches”Another user commented, “Keeta Hill is very strong for going on #WAGsToRiches and explaining the whole 9 kids thing, and having the 10th baby.. ahh I wouldn’t have said sh*t or even been on the show in the first place 😭 but that must be what strength is”.Neither the star player, Tyreek Hill, nor his wife Keeta Vaccaro have commented on the criticism they have received from fans due to the way their relationship was portrayed on the new Netflix series WAGs to Riches.Many fans have also slammed Keeta Vaccaro’s mother due to a few controversial statements made by her in the last episode of the Netflix show. In the eighth episode, the show features a discussion between Tyreek Hill’s wife Keeta Vaccaro and her mother about the star player’s children. Keeta Vaccaro’s mother says, “being married to an athlete, of course they are gonna have a lotta girlfriends” and this has not gone down well with fans of the couple.While Tyreek Hill does have children with other women, his marriage with Keeta Vaccaro has been pretty smooth and drama free. The two got married in 2023 and welcomed their first child in November 2024.The two did get engaged in 2021 but as revealed by Keeta Vaccaro, they had broken up in between.Also Read: Hailee Steinfeld reveals the "weird" thing that she wants to do about her proposal photo and why she wore her proposal dress as Josh Allen went down on one knee
Article Summary: The netflix show, wags to riches consists of eight episodes and was shot when keeta vaccaro was still pregnant with their daughter. In the eighth episode, the show features a discussion between tyreek hill’s wife keetavaccaro and her mother about the star player's children. The star player has ten children with multiple women.

Article Title: Joe Burrow spotted with a woman who was previously seen with CeeDee Lamb sparking bizarre speculation among fans
Article Text:
Image via Cooper Neill/Getty

Joe Burrow Was Recently Spotted With A Woman Who Was Also Spotted With Ceedee Lamb And Fans Have Questions About It



Joe Burrow Has Kept His Dating Life Pretty Private After He Broke Up With His Ex Girlfriend



Joe Burrow , the quarterback of the Cincinnati Bengals , has a huge fan base among women and many are curious about his personal life, which he mostly likes to keep private. Recently, a picture of him with a woman has gone viral, raising eyebrows. While fans are curious about the woman, but now there is a bizarre speculation going on and it includes CeeDee lambs.Recently, a picture of Joe Burrow has gone viral with Thursday Night Football’s feature reporter Taylor Rooks. The picture is undated and shows the two laughing as they sat next to each other at a high end restaurant. While fans are curious about the nature of their relationship, there is a bizarre speculation going around that Taylor Rooks was “previously with” Ceedee Lambs.A fan took to X and wrote, “Wasn’t she just with CeeDee Lamb?”, while another fan wrote, “Wasnt she just with CeeDee lamb last week??”A third fan wrote, “CeeDee punching air rn”. The reason for this speculation is, just a day before the Super Bowl, Taylor Rooks was spotted with Ceedee Lambs at a party in New Orleans.In the pictures that have gone viral, Ceedee Lamb is dressed in a white graphic T-shirt as he wrapped his arm around Taylor Rooks. Taylor Rooks looked stunning as she wore a black strapless dress and big golden hoops. She kept her short hair open and opted for minimal makeup to complete her look for the night.When the picture of Taylor Rooks with Ceedee Lamb had gone viral, fans were losing their minds over how beautiful they looked together. A fan wrote, “Now that is a beautiful couple!”, while another fan wrote, “If this his gf lamb is winning she’s beautiful let’s go Lamb!”Currently, there is no confirmation if Taylor Rooks is dating either of the NFL players or is just friends with both of them but fans have made up their own stories.As for Joe Burrow, he remains officially single as he has not confirmed any relationship rumours after his relationship with ex girlfriend Olivia Holzmacher ended in 2023. Olivia Holzmacher and Joe Burrow met in college back in 2017 and remained together for a couple of years.She was also spotted cheering on for Joe Burrow many times and there were also rumours about an engagement. As luck would have it, things did not work out between the two and they broke up.Later, Joe Burrow was rumoured to be dating famous Olivia Ponton but the two have not confirmed their relationship yet. Many people have continued to troll Olivia Ponton and tease the two but they have remained tight lipped.Joe Burrow and Olivia Ponton continue to follow each other on social media despite not opening up to the media. The last time he opened up about his dating life was when he was with his previous girlfriend. He dated her for a couple of years and they went their separate ways in 2023.Also Read: Taylor Swift has "fresh evidence" against her in Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni drama that is raising new questions

Article Title: JJ Redick cracks hilarious $1 billion joke on LeBron James after another 40-point showdown against Portland Trail Blazers
Article Text:
LeBron James and JJ Redick. Image via: Jonathan Hui-Imagn Images

Los Angeles Lakers

Portland Trail Blazers

JJ Redick

JJ Redick showered praise for LeBron James with a hilarious joke



LeBron James and JJ Redick. Image via: Adam Pantozzi/NBAE via Getty Images

have seemingly bounced back as they have secured a stunning win against theon Thursday night. At 40 years old, on the second night of a back-to-back, the four-time NBA champion, LeBron James delivered a jaw-dropping 40-point performance to lead the Los Angeles Lakers to a 121-112 win over the Portland Trail Blazers. His efforts left Lakers head coachboth stunned and inspired, as he showered James with praise following the game. LeBron James has recently dealt with lingering injuries and only confirmed fit to play hours before tipoff but showed no signs of slowing down. He shot an efficient 14-for-24 from the field, including 4-of-8 from beyond the arc, and added eight rebounds and four assists.Head coach JJ Redick , who has always been a vocal admirer of James’ work ethic and longevity, couldn’t hold back his admiration for the legend. Speaking to reporters in a post-game presser, he shared his honest thoughts on the King’s astonishing performance.“He really just defies anything that's normal, and not just the physical feats and the plays—it’s the mentality,” Redick said. “He is—I believe I saw the other day he's a billionaire—and he's playing on the second night of a back-to-back at 40 after 22 years with every record and every accolade.”Redick continued his witty remark, “And the kids will say that I'm glazing him. He's one of the greatest competitors. [Assistant coach] Nate [McMillan] and I were talking before the game—he's amazing to coach. He brings it every single day, he sets the standard for how you're supposed to approach this craft. That’s to me the most incredible thing—the mindset to do it, get up the next day, do it, over and over again.”James’ ability to maintain this level of excellence post-40 has been undeniably top of the word, according to fan analysts. For two decades, he has maintained his stature as a standout star and forged his legacy with a stunning resume to his name.Additionally, James has just added another milestone in his career. By playing his 1,542nd game, he passed Vince Carter to claim third place on the NBA’s all-time games played list. Now, only Kareem Abdul-Jabbar (1,560) and Robert Parish (1,611) stand ahead of him. The 1 billion-rich athlete (per Forbes) is currently averaging 24.7 points per game, 7.7 rebounds, and 8.9 assists. James also holds the youngest and oldest NBA star to score 40 points in a game.Also Read: Los Angeles Lakers legend LeBron James creates another milestone surpassing Vince Carter A huge part of the Lakers’ success against Portland also came from Austin Reaves in the recent game against the Trail Blazers. Reaves delivered a stellar performance of his own, finishing with 32 points on 9-for-21 shooting.With this victory, the Lakers improved to 33-21 on the season, now sitting firmly in fifth place in the Western Conference.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers beat the portland trail blazers 121-112 on thursday night. Lebron james scored 40 points on 14-for-24 shooting, including 4-of-8 from beyond the arc. Head coach jj redick showered praise on the four-time nba champion.

Article Title: Magic Johnson shares a heartfelt birthday message for his oldest son Andre Johnson: “You’ve made me so proud”
Article Text:
Andre Johnson and Magic Johnson. Image via: magicjohnson/ Instagram

Magic Johnson

Andre Johnson

44th birthday

Magic Johnson poured fatherly love for his son Andre Johnson on his 44th Birthday



Magic Johnson and his son Andre Johnson. Image via: magicjohnson/ Instagram

Magic Johnson recently celebrated Valentine’s Day with his wife Cookie Johnson



NBA legendhas spent decades captivating fans with his incredible skills on the court, but his greatest pride lies in his family. Recently, the five-time NBA champion took to social media to celebrate the special occasion of his firstborn,as he celebrated his. The NBA Hall of Gamer shared a heartfelt message with photos of the duo sharing their father-son moments.On February 20, Magic Johnson paid tribute to his eldest son, Andre, with an emotional Instagram post. Andre, who has forged his own path outside of basketball, has built a successful career in business and entrepreneurship. After acquiring experience at Magic Johnson Enterprises , he went on to become the executive vice president of business development at SimWin Sports and co-hosts the podcast Please Elaborate.Magic’s birthday tribute was filled with warmth and admiration, as he shared a nostalgic series of photos that captured their journey together over the years. The post featured a young Andre as a child, followed by snapshots of father and son in different phases of life.Alongside the photos, Magic expressed his pride and love in a touching caption: “Happy Birthday to my oldest son Andre! You’ve made me so proud of the man, husband, father, and entrepreneur that you’ve become. I can’t wait to see how you continue to evolve over this next year of life. I love you!”Fans were quick to react, praising the Lakers legend for being such a dedicated father. Magic has always been vocal about his love for his children and his wife supporting his family on different occasions.While Magic’s love as a father is undeniable, his devotion as a husband is just as inspiring. The Hall of Famer and business mogul has been married to Cookie Johnson for over 30 years, and their bond remains as strong as ever. As the world celebrated Valentine’s Day, Magic took the opportunity to express his gratitude for his lifelong partner.Sharing a beautifully curated video montage of their memories together, Magic wrote a heartfelt caption that touched the hearts of many: “Through every season of life, you’ve been my greatest blessing. After 40+ years, I’m still in awe of you and thank God everyday that I get to call you mine. To my love Cookie, Happy Valentine’s Day! ❤️”Cookie, equally devoted to their love story, responded with her own moving tribute: “After all these years, you are still the one who makes my heart smile! My forever Valentine, my greatest gift from God, and my love for a lifetime. I love you, Earvin! 🥰❤️” To which Magic affectionately replied, “My forever valentine. I love you!” Their social media presence and love for each other makes them one of the NBA power couples.Also Read: Magic Johnson reacts to Kendrick Lamar’s Super Bowl halftime show amid buzz over controversial Drake diss Magic Johnson’s dedication to his family has always been the headline grabber with fans pouring support for the NBA legend’s kind heart. He has been a devoted husband and father to his kids as the NBA legend never hesitated to show his love for his family on his social media.
Article Summary: Magic johnson celebrated his 44th birthday with a touching instagram post. The nba legend paid tribute to his eldest son, andre, with a series of photos. Magic has always been vocal about his love for his children and his wife. The couple recently celebrated valentine's day together.

Article Title: Will Jimmy Butler play tonight against the Dallas Mavericks? Latest update on the Golden State Warriors star's injury report (February 23, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Jimmy Butler playing tonight? (Image via Benny Sieu- Imagn Images)

Golden State Warriors

Jimmy Butler

Is Jimmy Butler playing tonight? Golden State Warriors injury report for tonight’s game against the Dallas Mavericks (February 23, 2025)

Warriors injury report Feb 23 (Image via NBA)

Jimmy Butler’s influence on the Golden State Warriors squad

When and where to watch the Golden State Warriors play tonight against the Dallas Mavericks (February 23, 2025)?

Thehave received a significant boost ahead of their clash with the Dallas Mavericks on Sunday, February 23, as, their newest acquisition, has been declared fit to play. The Warriors, currently holding a 29-27 record, will host the Mavericks (31-26) at Chase Center in San Francisco, with tip-off scheduled for 3:30 PM ET. Jimmy Butler , who joined the Warriors earlier this season, has been a key figure in their recent resurgence. His availability comes as a relief for the team, especially with Jonathan Kuminga sidelined due to an ankle injury. Butler’s presence on the court is expected to bolster the Warriors’ offensive and defensive efforts as they aim to climb the Western Conference standings. The Mavericks , on the other hand, are grappling with a lengthy injury report. Key players like Anthony Davis (groin), Daniel Gafford (knee), and Dereck Lively (ankle) are ruled out, while Dwight Powell (hip) is listed as day-to-day. P.J. Washington (ankle) remains questionable, further depleting Dallas’ roster depth.Jimmy Butler’s availability couldn’t have come at a better time for the Warriors . Known for his tenacity and leadership, Butler has been instrumental in close games, providing clutch performances and steadying the team during critical moments. His ability to contribute across multiple facets of the game—scoring, playmaking, and defense—makes him an invaluable asset for Golden State.The Warriors’ recent form has been promising, with Stephen Curry leading the charge, averaging 23.4 points per game. Butler’s addition to the lineup complements Curry’s offensive prowess, creating a dynamic duo that could pose significant challenges for the Mavericks’ defense.Fans can catch the action live on ABC and ESPN+ or stream the game via Fubo, which offers comprehensive coverage of NBA games and other live sports.Also read: Will Stephen Curry play tonight against the Dallas Mavericks? Latest update on the Golden State Warriors star's injury report (February 23, 2025) With Butler fit and ready to go, the Warriors are well-positioned to capitalize on the Mavericks’ injury woes. As the team continues its push for a playoff spot, Butler’s availability could be the X-factor that propels Golden State to victory.For the latest updates on the Warriors and exclusive NBA content, stay tuned to official channels and streaming platforms.
Article Summary: Golden state warriors have received a significant boost ahead of their clash with the dallas mavericks (february 23, 2025) jimmy butler has been declared fit to play. The warriors, currently holding a 29-27 record, will host the mavericks (31-26) at chase center in san francisco, with tip-off scheduled for 3:30 pm et.

India started their ICC Champions Trophy 2025 journey on a high note with a commanding six-wicket victory over Bangladesh. Chasing a target of 229 runs, India successfully reached the total with 21 balls to spare. The star of the match was vice-captain Shubman Gill, who played a stellar unbeaten knock of 101 runs off 129 balls, earning him the ‘Player of the Match’ award.India’s bowlers, led by veteran pacer Mohammed Shami, were instrumental in restricting Bangladesh to a modest total of 228 runs. Shami’s exceptional performance saw him claim five wickets, making him the fastest bowler to take 200 ODI wickets in terms of balls bowled, surpassing Australian pacer Mitchell Starc’s record. Additionally, he became the fastest Indian to achieve the milestone in terms of matches played, breaking the previous record held by Ajit Agarkar.Indian skipper Rohit Sharma also achieved a significant milestone in the match, becoming the second-fastest batsman in ODI history to reach 11,000 runs. He accomplished this feat in 11,868 balls, trailing only behind Virat Kohli’s record of 11,831 balls.With this victory, India now shifts its focus to the much-anticipated clash against Pakistan, their arch-rivals and defending champions. The upcoming India vs Pakistan match is set to take place in Dubai, and a loss for Pakistan could lead to their early elimination from the tournament.Pakistan’s campaign has started on a disappointing note. They suffered a 60-run loss to New Zealand in the opening match at the National Stadium in Karachi. With a defeat against India, Pakistan could face early elimination from the tournament.
Article Summary: India started their icc champions trophy 2025 journey on a high note with a commanding six-wicket victory over bangladesh. The star of the match was vice-captain shubman gill, who played a stellar unbeaten knock of 101 runs off 129 balls.

NEW DELHI: India and Pakistan are set to clash in a high-stakes ICC Champions Trophy encounter on Sunday, with both teams chasing different objectives. India, buoyed by their six-wicket win over Bangladesh, look to secure a semifinal berth, while Pakistan, reeling from a 60-run defeat to New Zealand, must win to remain in contention for the last-four spots.The two arch-rivals last met in a Champions Trophy match in 2017, when Pakistan triumphed in the summit clash. The tournament is making a comeback after eight years since the 2017 edition.Although diplomatic tensions have eased, muting the usual fervor, anticipation remains high for this Group A showdown at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.India hold a clear advantage, having acclimatised to the conditions, while Pakistan arrive in Dubai straight after their loss to New Zealand in Karachi. With form and familiarity on their side, India head into Sunday’s clash with a psychological edge.The Champions Trophy clash between India and Pakistan at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium on February 23 is expected to proceed without any rain interruption, despite rainfall occurring in Dubai days before India's tournament opener.The forecast indicates partly cloudy conditions during afternoon hours, with temperatures ranging between 22 degrees Celsius at its lowest and reaching up to 32 degrees Celsius at its peak.31 DegreesMostly sunny and warm20 km/h5%32 DegreesMostly sunny and warm30 km/h23%26 DegreesPartly cloudy and warm24 km/h100%The playing surface at the Dubai International Stadium provides opportunities for both batting and bowling, with conditions that can fluctuate. During day/night contests, as the surface becomes drier, spin bowlers often find increased effectiveness. The initial phase favours pace bowling, with the potential for movement in the air and bounce off the surface. Whilst scoring opportunities exist, as evidenced by typical first innings totals, the venue does not consistently yield substantial scores.Spin bowling proves particularly crucial during the middle phase, as the surface tends to assist turn. Pace bowlers find value with the new ball, extracting movement and lift. In day/night fixtures, the presence of dew can be influential in the toss decision.Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill (vc), Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul (wk), Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Washington Sundar, Kuldeep Yadav, Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Shami, Arshdeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Rishabh Pant (wk), Ravindra Jadeja, Varun Chakaravarthy.Mohammad Rizwan (c, wk), Salman Ali Agha (vc), Babar Azam, Fakhar Zaman, Kamran Ghulam, Saud Shakeel, Tayyab Tahir, Faheem Ashraf, Khushdil Shah, Usman Khan, Abrar Ahmed, Haris Rauf, Mohammad Hasnain, Naseem Shah, Shaheen Shah Afridi.
Article Summary: India and pakistan face each other in a high-stakes icc champions trophy encounter on sunday. The two arch-rivals last met in a champions trophy match in 2017, when pakistan triumphed in the summit clash. The tournament is making a comeback after eight years since the 2017 edition.

NEW DELHI: India and Pakistan are set to face off in a highly anticipated clash at the 2025 ICC Champions Trophy in Dubai on Sunday. This match holds significant importance for both teams in their pursuit of a semi-final berth from Group A.India, led by Rohit Sharma , commenced their campaign with a convincing six-wicket victory over Bangladesh at Dubai International Cricket Stadium on Wednesday. In contrast, the defending champions, Pakistan, suffered a 60-run loss against New Zealand in the tournament opener at the National Stadium in Karachi earlier this week.For Pakistan, this encounter is a must-win situation to keep their semi-final hopes alive, while a win for India would almost guarantee them a spot in the last four of the eight-team marquee event.In their previous ODI meeting during the 2023 World Cup in Ahmedabad, India emerged victorious by seven wickets, with captain Rohit and Shreyas Iyer scoring half-centuries. However, India faced a setback in their encounter against Pakistan in the 2017 Champions Trophy final at The Oval, where they missed out on their second title in the tournament.Also See: India vs Pakistan Head to Head Records Despite this, India hold a psychological edge, having remained unbeaten against Pakistan in their last six ODIs, including the 2023 Asia Cup group stage washout, since 2018.The two teams last met in the 2024 T20 World Cup group stage match in New York, where India emerged victorious by nine runs. Jasprit Bumrah 's impressive figures of 3/14 earned him the Player of the Match award, and India went on to win the title, defeating South Africa in the final to claim their second T20 World Cup trophy after their triumph in 2007 edition under MS Dhoni.Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul (wk), Axar Patel, Hardik Pandya Ravindra Jadeja , Mohammed Shami, Harshit Rana, Kuldeep YadavImam-ul-Haq, Babar Azam , Saud Shakeel, Mohammad Rizwan (c/wk), Agha Salman, Kamran Ghulam, Khushdil Shah, Shaheen Afridi, Naseem Shah, Haris Rauf, Abrar AhmedA prolific opener with a knack for big hits, Rohit showed glimpses of his power-hitting abilities against Bangladesh. Known for his experience and leadership are crucial in high-pressure games, the Indian skipper will be aiming to dominate pace and spin alike, making him a game-changer at the top.Known for his hunger for runs, Kohli thrives in chases and high-stakes encounters. Despite undergoing a lean patch in white-ball cricket currently, Kohli remains India's supreme source of temperament, making him one of the most reliable batters in ODI cricket.Having scored a half-century in a losing cause during the tournament opener, Pakistan’s batting mainstay Babar will be looking to pose a threat against India's bowling attack. His ability to anchor an innings and accelerate when needed is vital for Pakistan’s success.A lethal left-arm pacer, Shaheen had a torrid tournament opener against Kiwis. However, his ability to swing the new ball and deliver yorkers at the death makes him a match-winner. His knack for picking up early wickets can put any opposition on the back foot.
Article Summary: India and pakistan face off in the 2025 icc champions trophy in dubai. The match holds significant importance for both teams in their pursuit of a semi-final berth from group a. india are unbeaten against pakistan in their last six odis, including the 2023 asia cup group stage washout, since 2018.
